text.name: sys_description
text.text: This section groups all the "favorite" games in your collection from all systems, organized in alphabetical order by default. It is a huge "Best of" in the world of retro-gaming, and includes major titles that have for some launched huge sagas still developed today. We often think of Mario, Sonic, Castlevania, Tomb Rider, Tony Hawk, GTA, Final Fantasy, etc. All the usual sorting filters are available for you to quickly find one of those games that marked your childhood game.
